title: IP point is reduced
body: it's pretty shitt..my ip point was 1619 last night and this morning after my first game my IP point down to 447....wtf????

replies.body: Sometimes it can take a bit for your IP/RP totals to update on the client. It looks like you had spent some IP that wasn't being reflected on your balance, then when you logged in this morning it updated with your current IP total.
